module.description: Skrill, który cieszy się zaufaniem milionów osób na całym świecie, wychodzi naprzeciw potrzebom ponad 156 000 firm, oferując wygodny i bezpieczny sposób wysyłania oraz otrz
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Skrill, który cieszy się zaufaniem milionów osób na całym świecie, wychodzi naprzeciw potrzebom ponad 156 000 firm, oferując wygodny i bezpieczny sposób wysyłania oraz otrzymywania pieniędzy w niemal 200 krajach i 40 walutach.
module.additional_description: Bezpłatna i szybka konfiguracjaUzyskaj dostęp do kart kredytowych i ponad 100 lokalnych rozwiązań płatniczych dzięki łatwej integracjiŁączność z ponad 50 milionami posiadaczy rachunku SkrillNajwyższe standardy bezpieczeństwa i technologia zapobiegająca nadużyciom finansowymPłynny sposób realizacji płatności za pomocą telefonu komórkowego, tabletu i komputera

module.name: paypal
module.description: PayPal jest liderem w branży płatności online i oferuje szeroką gamę szybkich, prostych i bezpiecznych rozwiązań płatniczych, które cieszą się zaufaniem ponad 250 milionów użytkownik&oac
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: PayPal jest liderem w branży płatności online i oferuje szeroką gamę szybkich, prostych i bezpiecznych rozwiązań płatniczych, które cieszą się zaufaniem ponad 250 milionów użytkowników. Ten bezpłatny oficjalny moduł umożliwia korzystanie z naszej zaawansowanej platformy handlowej i rozwijanie działalności handlowej w Internecie, w tym także za granicą oraz na urządzeniach mobilnych.
module.additional_description: Łatwa aktywacja: z PayPal możesz niemal natychmiast zacząć odbierać płatności bez żadnych opłat za uruchomienie usługi! Nasze zoptymalizowane rozwiązania mobilne pozwolą Ci zwiększyć współczynnik konwersji nawet do 88,7%* i nie wymagają dodatkowej integracji. A dzięki funkcji One Touch™ kupujący mogą płacić za zakupy jeszcze szybciej niż dotychczas! Program ochrony sprzedających: chroń swoje dochody przed internetowymi oszustwami, korzystając z ochrony sprzedających w systemie PayPal. Ochroną mogą być objęte zarówno artykuły materialne, jak i dobra niematerialne, a także większość usług.  Przejrzyste zasady dotyczące opłat gwarantują, że nie spotkają Cię niemiłe niespodzianki. Żadnych ukrytych opłat. Prowizja jest naliczana tylko podczas odbierania płatności. Im więcej płatności otrzymujesz, tym mniej za to płacisz.  * Współczynnik konwersji obliczony w IV kwartale 2017 r. w ramach internetowego badania Comscore. Analizie poddano zachowania zakupowe w dwudziestu witrynach dużych handlowców z różnych kategorii przy wykorzystaniu panelu obejmującego milion konsumentów w USA.

module.name: boxtalconnect
module.displayName: Boxtal Connect - The best shipping solution
module.description: Managing your shipments becomes easier with our free plugin Boxtal! Save time thanks to our shipping center and enjoy our negotiated rates with 15 carriers: Colissimo, Mondial Relay, Relais Colis, UPS
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Managing your shipments becomes easier with our free plugin Boxtal! Save time thanks to our shipping center and enjoy our negotiated rates with 15 carriers: Colissimo, Mondial Relay, Relais Colis, UPS, DHL, etc.
module.additional_description: 1. Multiply your conversion rate by 2 and boost your net salesWith our negotiated rates for 15 carriers, with no contract and no minimum volume requirement, you offer the best delivery rates to your customers.Maximize your chances to convert by offering the 3 types of shipping expected by your customers: the economic collection point (Mondial Relay, Relais Colis ...), home delivery in 48H (Colissimo) or the express for the most hurried ones (Chronopost, UPS, Fedex, TNT, DHL ...).The Boxtal Connect plugin can display the pick-up location map for carriers of your choice.And it's as simple as a checkbox in your backoffice! 2. Save 1 hour each day in the management of your shippingsOur free Boxtal Connect plugin allows you to import your orders on boxtal.com in 1 click and manage your shipments in record time. No need to re-enter information, your customer’s choice of delivery is retrieved and the corresponding offers are listed. All you have to do is print all your transport labels and prepare your parcels.Boxtal helps you in the customs formalities for your international shipments: when filling an order, we display the right form and the necessary documents are generated at the same time as the labels. 3. Improve your customers' experience to build loyaltyWith Boxtal's efficient parcel tracking, you know where your parcels are located and you are informed of delays or delivery incidents! Your customers can view tracking statuses and receive shipping notifications if you turn on this option.Finally, you can generate return labels in just a few clicks in case your customers want to do so. 4. Security and reliability for you and your customersThe privacy and security of your data are important to you ? No worries: all the exchanges between your WooCommerce shop and Boxtal are encrypted! Nobody will be able to intercept your information or those of your customers.Ensuring the availability of our solution 24 hours a day is our priority: we constantly monitor our technical infrastructure to ensure that your business will not be disrupted.

module.name: realexpaymentshpp
module.description: Global Payments Inc. is a leading worldwide payment provider of payment technology and software solutions delivering innovative services to our customers globally, servicing over 2
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Global Payments Inc. is a leading worldwide payment provider of payment technology and software solutions delivering innovative services to our customers globally, servicing over 2.5 million business worldwide.
module.additional_description: Global Payments makes it easy for businesses to accept online, on mobile and in-app payments, blending global coverage, local expertise and the best possible service to help drive business growth. Our core e-commerce platform delivers a seamless, secure payment experience - while our add-on software solutions help you to optimise conversion, sell globally and simplify your PCI scope for one-off and regular card payments. Using the Global Payments plugin as part of your solution enables you to benefit from a seamless, no-hassle integration with industry leading features and support. Maximize ConversionsSell anywhere - with a payments page that adapts to any device so your customers flow easily through the buying process, on desktop, mobile or tablet.Customize the payment experience- with a branded payment page that integrates simply with PrestaShop, and adapts to 30+ languages with multiple payment methods and currencies.Store customer details - with secure card storage and full visibility into stored cards for you and your customers. Minimize Fraud Monitor, manage, and minimize: fraud and chargebacks with instant access to 30+ fraud checks to hold or block suspicious transactions.Configure new fraud rules easily: with plain language and an intuitive interface, whilst experimenting new rules in passive mode to analyze impact prior to go live. Retain Control Transparent reporting in real-time - helps you to reconcile transactions, with the ability to search, void, and rebate your transactions easily.Simplify - PCI compliance & reduce audit costs while retaining complete control of the end-to-end payment experience for your customers.

module.name: sofortbanking
module.description: Direct payment via online banking. Easy, quick and secure – without registration
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Direct payment via online banking. Easy, quick and secure – without registration. Automatic data transfer and the real-time transaction notification enable a smooth payment process and a faster delivery.
module.additional_description: Attractive- Cost savings through low fees- Credited funds are irreversible- Low default risk- Low storage costs thanks to short processing times Easy- Automated and transparent processes- Easy integration thanks to more than 100 plug-ins for standardized shop systems as well as an efficient API for individual shop systems- Convenient for your customers as they can use their online banking details- No eWallet and thus no registration required for your customers Fast- Funds are transferred directly from customer’s online banking account to your bank account- Real-time transaction notification after the transfer has been listed- All within one process - faster than advanced payment (by bank transfer)- Fast cash flow, high liquidity Secure- Data is transferred in an encrypted form via secured connections- Payment system certified by TÜV Saarland with a certified data protection (TÜV Saarland is a German, state-approved monitoring body for the inspection and maintenance of security standards)- Data processing center in Germany in accordance with strict banking standards

module.name: bluesnap
module.description: BlueSnap is an all-in-one payment solution, providing both a merchant account and payment gateway designed to accelerate commerce for merchants selling globally
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: BlueSnap is an all-in-one payment solution, providing both a merchant account and payment gateway designed to accelerate commerce for merchants selling globally.   By connecting your PrestaShop store with BlueSnap, you can accept payments securely from shoppers anywhere in the world in their local currency. BlueSnap provides analytics and reporting to make it easy to identify opportunities for higher conversions. In addition, PrestaShop merchants process credit and debit card transactions with a secure checkout form, which is displayed directly on your checkout page so shoppers never leave your store.
module.additional_description: All-in one payment solution:Combined merchant account and payment gateway for fast & easy on-boardingAbility to board merchants globallyNo long-term contracts or setup fees, and the most competitive transaction fees in the industryHigher payment conversionsMinimized PCI Scope

module.name: paypalmx

module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: PayPal es la forma más fácil, rápida y segura de enviar y recibir pagos en línea. Es uno de los principales impulsores del comercio electrónico en México.

module.name: emarketing
module.description: Boost your sales on Google Shopping with PrestaShop's marketing solution! The PrestaShop Ads module is your one-click-solution for advertising on Google Shopping
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Boost your sales on Google Shopping with PrestaShop's marketing solution! The PrestaShop Ads module is your one-click-solution for advertising on Google Shopping. Easy campaign creation, price-comparison and competitor-check included. Free of charge.
module.additional_description: Use the PrestaShop Ads software to create Google Shopping campaigns in no time and without any AdWords knowledge. Our system optimizes your campaigns continuously and fully automated for maximum performance. The PrestaShop Ads module generates the product data feed required for Google Shopping as well as it installs the Conversion Tracking automatically.                                                            You haven’t advertised on Google yet? No problem at all, the PrestaShop Ads module can create an AdWords account and Merchant Center on your behalf. Powerful tools assist you in focusing your ad budget on your most promising products: Use our automated price comparison to find out if competitors offer your products at a cheaper price. PrestaShop Ads  - powered by emarketing is a Google Premium Partner and Google’s Overall Champion EU 2015

module.name: dotpay
module.description: Dotpay umożliwia szybkie i wygodne przyjmowanie płatności internetowych dla sprzedających w e-sklepie na bazie oprogramowania PrestaShop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Dotpay umożliwia szybkie i wygodne przyjmowanie płatności internetowych dla sprzedających w e-sklepie na bazie oprogramowania PrestaShop. Załóż swoje konto i przekonaj się, ile zyskasz, płacąc online z Dotpay!
module.additional_description: Współpraca Dotpay z PrestaShop jest odpowiedzią na zapotrzebowanie sprzedawców, którzy, minimalizując nakłady, chcą zwiększyć swoje możliwości sprzedażowe. Możliwości oferowane przez PrestaShop nie ograniczają się jedynie do podstawowych funkcji sklepu internetowego. Obejmują również wszechstronne możliwości budowania oferty oraz analizowania sprzedaży, stosowanie systemu banerów i komentarzy, obsługę kanałów RSS czy porównywanie produktów. Przydatną funkcjonalnością jest możliwość tworzenia indywidualnych szablonów graficznych, zmieniając w ten sposób domyślny wygląd e-sklepu. Co więcej, oprogramowanie można łatwo rozszerzać za pomocą dodatkowych modułów zewnętrznych.

module.name: magnalister
module.description: Połącz Twój PrestaShop z wielkimi platformami sprzedażowymi, jak eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister czy CDiscount
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Połącz Twój PrestaShop z wielkimi platformami sprzedażowymi, jak eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister czy CDiscount.
module.additional_description: Optymizuje widoczność Twoich produktów na platformach handlowychSprzedawaj więcej niż kiedykolwiek dotąd: 78% zakupów w internecie odbywa się na wielkich platformach, jak Amazon czy eBay. To właśnie są najważniejsze kanały sprzedaży, które dramatycznie poprawią Twoje możliwości zbytu. magnalister zrobi z Twojego PrestaShop centralę zarządzania, z której możesz wygodnie sterować inwentarzem i zamówieniami na wszystkich podłączonych platformach sprzedażowych.magnalister to idealne połączenie pomiędzy sklepem PrestaShop a wielkimi platformami sprzedażowymi. 4 centralne procesy dbają o optymalne zarządzanie sprzedażą:Wystawianie produktów wprost z PrestaShop (z użyciem opisu, grafik, innych danych jak marka, kolor czy kod EAN, zapisanych w sklepie PrestaShop) na platformy sprzedażowe,Import zamówień z platform do panelu zamówień sklepu PrestaShop,Synchronizacja stanów magazynu i cen ze sklepu PrestaShop na platformy sprzedażowe,Synchronizacja statusu zamówień ("Wysłane") ze sklepu PrestaShop na platformy sprzedażowe. Dodatkowe funkcje, jak zarządzanie wariacjami produktów, czy elastyczna konfiguracja cen dla każdej platformy czynią sprzedaż multikanałową czystą przyjemnością.Pierwsze 30 dni gratis! Po zarejestrowaniu w serwisie otrzymasz klucz aktywacyjny (PassPhrase), którym możesz aktywować moduł. Przez pierwsze 30 dni nie pobieramy żadnych opłat. Po upływie tego okresu magnalister kosztuje (łącznie z wsparciem) od 29,- EUR miesięcznie (+VAT).

module.additional_description: FAST settlement: Get paid to your nominated account in as little as 1 business day.EASY setup: Start transacting sooner with eWAY in just a few clicks.HELPFUL: Access 24/7 phone, email, and live chat support.HUMAN: Our local team of payment experts work around the clock.Advanced Fraud Prevention: Get real-time fraud monitoring on all your transactions.Detailed Reporting: Plan your next move with access to transaction reports in our MYeWAY Dashboard.Developer friendly: Our RapidAPI and Developer friendly tools let you fully customise the checkout experience to convert more sales.Reduce PCI Compliance: We help to secure your payments and reduce PCI compliance scope with our innovative payment technologies.

module.name: brainify
module.description: Gain time and make the best possible marketing decisions thanks to E-commerce analytics.Take control of your data
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Gain time and make the best possible marketing decisions thanks to E-commerce analytics.Take control of your data.
module.additional_description: Managing your e-commerce site has never been so simple. Brainify Free Dashboard focuses on the key elements of the online sale cycle and summarises this strategic data in the form of an array of dashboards.  At each key step in your selling cycle you will be guided by a beautifully designed dashboard, summarising the essential data. 1.     Acquisition2.     Sales3.     Products4.     Costumers5.     Cross sell Don’t miss an important event and gain time by leaving Brainify to summarise the most important elements of your commercial strategy.Don’t let the secrets of your data pass you by damaging your daily turnover. Receive suggestions of performance enhancing tools to improve your performance. Take control of your e-business and join the e commerce republic thanks to free e-commerce analytics.The magic is in your data, it becomes a toy to help you to act more quickly by enabling a simple and efficient understanding.

module.name: klarnaofficial
module.description: Klarna Checkout is a complete online checkout solution designed to increase sales and customer loyalty. Available in Austria, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Netherlands, Norway, Sweden, United Kingdom
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Klarna Checkout is a complete online checkout solution designed to increase sales and customer loyalty. Available in Austria, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Netherlands, Norway, Sweden, United Kingdom.
module.additional_description: Klarna will improve your checkout experience by providing ways by direct by banking, by invoice or financing. We call these magical payment methods Pay now, Pay later and Slice it. Simple, safe, and oh so smoooth. No matter what Klarna option your customer chooses to pay, you get paid when the goods ship. Klarna deliversOne-click repeat purchases.Global support, local optimization.Klarna absorbs all credit and fraud risk.It’s easy to get started with Klarna. Your benefitYou will see an increase in conversions and order value.You will reach a new audience.You will always get paid.Less operations more selling. Klarna maximizes conversion rates by letting consumers pay in a simple way when and how they prefer to. More people who enter the checkout will actually complete their purchase. To get the credentials you need to get started with Klarna Checkout, sign up here: https://eu.portal.klarna.com/signup/?products=kco&platform=prestashop

module.name: getresponse
module.description: Connect your store with GetResponse and use all-in-one-online marketing tools to convert contacts to customers
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Connect your store with GetResponse and use all-in-one-online marketing tools to convert contacts to customers. With a full suite of powerful ecommerce features, it’s easy to market your online shop and sell more to your customers.
module.additional_description: GetResponse for PrestaShop is a free integration that allows you to populate your product inventory in GetResponse, add customers and order details to your GetResponse list, see what your customers love to buy, and then take action. Send automated, personalized offers to convert more customers and sell more products. Syncing your PrestaShop products and purchase data with your GetResponse account means you can send timely, personalized offers, win back abandoned carts, upsell with automated product recommendations, build high-converting sales funnels that promote your products, and more.  More than 350,000 customers in 183 countries trust GetResponse, the easiest all-in-one online marketing platform, to help grow their business. From small businesses to bigger enterprises, GetResponse customers can harness the power of email marketing, sales and marketing funnels, marketing automation, webinars, CRM, and advanced ecommerce tools to optimize and automate critical points of the customer journey – all from one account.

module.name: smartsupp

module.description_full: Livechat dla stron i sklepów internetowych. Rozpocznij personalne rozmowy z odwiedzającymi i zmień ich w zadowolonych klientów.
module.additional_description: Smartsupp pozwala Ci na osobiste rozmowy z Twoimi odwiedzającymi i zmianę ich w szczęśliwych klientów. Wybierz najpopularniejsze rozwiązanie czat w Europie, używane przez 283 000 sklepów i stron internetowych. Zobacz szczegółowe informacje o odwiedzających w silnym dashboardzie webowym. Czatuj z klientami w drodze dzięki naszym aplikacjom mobilnym dla iOS i Android. Zaangażuj odwiedzających poprzez wiadomości automatyczne. Zmierz jakość Twojej obsługi klienta dzięki szczegółowym statystykom. Uzyskaj lepsze zrozumienie zachowanie odwiedzających dzięki nagrywaniu gości. Twoi klienci są teraz na Twojej stronie. Stwórz darmowe konto na www.smartsupp.com i zacznij z nimi czat już dzisiaj.

module.name: becommerce
module.description: BeCommerce is the Belgian Non-Profit that contributes to the strengthening of consumer confidence in e-commerce by a formal labeling process of e-commerce sites
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: BeCommerce is the Belgian Non-Profit that contributes to the strengthening of consumer confidence in e-commerce by a formal labeling process of e-commerce sites. Thanks to its trustmark, BeCommerce contributes to the growth of the sector.
module.additional_description: 1. Confidence and the BeCommerce TrustmarkConsumer trust is crucial and our Trustmark contributes to the increasement of the trust level in e-commerce. In order to use our Trustmark, the webshop has to go through a certification process performed by an independent audit office, Bureau Veritas. Bureau Veritas checks your webshop on about 40 points. Once the certification has been successfully completed, it can carry both the BeCommerce and the Ecommerce Europe Trustmarks. We have also negotiated an advantageous price for our members for a rating and review system for your consumers. In addition, BeCommerce also provides twice a year a free penetration test of the webshop urls, so you remain protected against hacking and phishing. Both the BeCommerce and the Ecommerce Europe Trustmarks generate extra trust and can yield more conversions and therefore extra revenues. 2. Research and DataWe provide our members regularly with relevant facts and figures. The BeCommerce Market Monitor gives some insights in consumer spendings on e-commerce in Belgium.  This study of about 70 pages clearly shows the trends and evolutions in Belgian e-commerce, and this on a quarterly basis. You can see who is buying online, how are they buying online, the different analyses by sector, the different payment methods, etc. In addition to the BeCommerce Market Monitor, BeCommerce also publishes the BeCommerce Shopping100, which is a top 100 of the webshops where Belgian consumers most often shop online, including a top 25 cross-border webshops. 3. Networking EventsEvery year we organize several recurring events on topics such as Logistics, Mobile and Cross-Border.  Various companies share their business cases, CEO’s debate some hot topics, and the attendees can discuss this during the network moments in between. The BeCommerce Awards are our yearly competition where various outstanding webshops can obtain prestigious prizes: it gathers the most important e-commerce players in the Belgian market. 4. Dispute ResolutionWe provide an independent ADR-mechanism for e-commerce consumers in Belgium, whereby we refer complaints to the webshop in question or to the ombudsman competent in the issue concerned. 5. Regulatory and Governmental AffairsWe offer our members legal support and keep them up-to-date on new developments in e-commerce.  Together with Ecommerce Europe, we defend the interests of e-commerce at both the European, national and regional levels. Ecommerce Europe is constantly monitoring the European Commission and can always influence new proposals that could affect e-commerce.

module.name: satispay

module.author: Community developer

module.additional_description: Direct connection to the consumer’s and the merchant’s bank account brings a structural cost advantage to processing payments that Satispay leverages to sign up merchants with a cost-effective, convenient and easy-to-use solution. Thanks to the efficiency of our independent network, Satispay can offer the service to merchants with a pricing model that is both cheap and easy to understand. There are no sign-up costs or monthly fees, the sole charge for merchants is 0.5% on payments less than or equal to 10€ and 0.5% + 0.20€ for payments greater than 10€. Satispay contributes to management costs reduction by improving users’ conversion rate also thanks to the new QR code payments experience.

Your benefits: more opens, more clicks and more conversions! This is the key to increasing sales: your customers buy more and more frequently – Profit. Profit. Profit.  Click on the top right „Download “-button now to download the module and install it in the PrestaShop backend without any great effort.  Afterwards, quickly and easily connect your PrestaShop with CleverReach®, synchronize your shop data and create and send your first email.  CleverReach® is the provider for email marketing for more than 240,000 customers, e.g. Spotify, Levi’s, Playboy, DHL and Amnesty International, in 152 countries. CleverReach® was founded in 2007 in Germany and complies with the highest standards of data protection. Exclusively for PrestaShop customers:Get a 10% discount off your CleverReach® rate for 12 months! Email marketing made easier: discount will automatically provided when creating a new account.

Dzięki prostej integracji naszego modułu PrestaShop, twoi klienci mogą płacić w twoim sklepie przy użyciu Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum i ponad 40 innych kryptowalut. W zamian za 1% stałą opłatę (brak początkowych oraz ukrytych kosztów), ochronimy cię przed wahaniami cen kryptowalut oraz chargebackami, obsłużymy wszystkie płatności twoich klientów i uregulujemy je na twój rachunek bankowy. Korzyści dla sprzedawców Zyskaj rozgłos i nowych klientów. Akceptowanie kryptowalut jest dobrym sposobem na wypromowanie sklepu i przyciągnięcie nowych klientów.Zero chargebacków oraz oszustw. Możesz czuć się bezpiecznie, ponieważ transakcje krypto są nieodwracalne.Zaoszczędź na transakcjach. Opłata za przetworzenie karty kredytowej to 3% lub więcej, zależnie od branży. Nasza opłata to TYLKO 1% za transakcję.

module.name: santanderpaymentsolutions

module.author: Patworx Multimedia
module.description_full: Offer your customers the most important online payment services from a single source. Santander Purchase on Account, Santander Instalment Purchase and Direct Transfer now make paying much easier.
module.additional_description: No risk – Santander takes on the default risk for Purchases on Account and Instalment Purchases at 100%. You receive your money – guaranteed. Real time saving – Santander is responsible for the collection process and thereby reduces your administrative effort. Individual settlement – you receive monthly transaction overviews, adapted to your individual needs Conversion increase – you benefit from the popularity of the product Purchase on Account, the preferred payment method for many customers. Improved liquidity for you – With Purchase on Account and Instalment Purchase you receive your payments each working day without having to wait for the value date. With Direct Transfer the customer instantly transfers the purchase amount to your account. Improved liquidity for your customers – you allow more customers to finance expensive goods with the help of variable instalments and flexile durations. Increased customer loyalty – your customers appreciate the uncomplicated handling and the respectful communication at eye level. Flexible payment – Purchase on Account allows your customer to pay payment terms of up to 30 days. Instalment Purchase offers variable instalments and flexible durations ranging from 3 to 26 months. Direct Transfer allows customers to pay the purchase amount via bank transfer without leaving the shop check-out.

module.additional_description: Be on the safe side with the Händlerbund Interface for Legal TextsLegal texts such as terms & conditions, right of withdrawal and publication details / website legal notices which are deficient hold the risk of costly written warnings from competitors. The legal experts of Händlerbund are specialized for e-commerce law and provide you with audited legal text – for your web shop or your business on more than 40 trading platforms. Of course we do accept liability for the legal texts provided by us (Händlerbund). By monitoring the legal situation and recent court decisions our legal experts take care for the legal texts’ relevance to the current legal situation. The Händlerbund Interface for Legal Texts allows you to update the terms and conditions, cancellation policies, etc. on your web shop with a few clicks through the member section on the Händlerbund website. Besides the legal texts service Hänblerbund provides numerous extensive service to its members. Thereby you can optimize your online business and make it legally safe. Benefits of the Händlerbund Interface for Legal Texts (depending on membership-status)Assistance with written warnings, free of charge in all judicial instancesRetroactive assistance possible, even if it is caused by negligenceQuick and competent legal advice regarding your web shopA personal contact partner available by phone or e-mailComprehensive review of your web shop with a personal legal advisor“Käufersiegel” customer review seal for unlimited number of web shopsSeal of approval “Käufersiegel” creates trust in your web shop Save money with the discount code!Use the discount code P754#2014 and get 3 months of Händlerbund Membership in the first year for free! Please noteYou need a Händlerbund Membership package to be able to use the Händlerbund Interface for Legal Texts. module.additional_description: Acutrack is a technology driven, experienced business partner. Ultimately, physical products offered with digital distribution helps you increase revenue, grow your brand and customer satisfaction

module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Secursus is the best-performing all-digital parcel insurance on the market. We insure your valuable parcels, whether new or used, up to 100,000 € per shipment.
module.additional_description: Insure your valuable parcels instantly without changing your current shipping method.All you have to do is indicate from what value you want your packages to be insured.Your customer will receive an automatic email with our contact details in case anything happens with a parcel.The insurance works with all carriers offering a sign-for delivery.Our team is available 7 / 7 to support claims with you, or with your client. Unlike insurances offered by carriers or online shipping comparators, our service covers all items that are always excluded from the insurance terms (high tech, phones, computers, luxury clothing, leather goods, watches, jewelry, art , second-hand items and many more)Our fixed price is also 30 to 70% cheaper and we cover packages up to 100.000 €

module.name: rtg_tracker
module.displayName: Retargeting - Ads with up to 50% better CPA
module.description: Retargeting offers a vast array of automated and fully personalized services as Facebook and Google Ads, personalized emails, pop-ups and on-site product recommendations based on machine learning
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Retargeting offers a vast array of automated and fully personalized services as Facebook and Google Ads, personalized emails, pop-ups and on-site product recommendations based on machine learning.
module.additional_description: OVERVIEW Retargeting is an eCommerce marketing automation and personalization platform.Being one of the first companies in Eastern Europe to be both Facebook Marketing Partner & Google Premier Partner, that offers a vast array of automated and fully personalized services from Google, Facebook & Instagram ads to personalized emails, pop-ups and onsite product recommendations, with significantly increased performance and at a lower cost.  WHAT THIS PRODUCT DOES FOR YOU  Google Dynamic AdsAbout 98% of the visitors of an online store leave the site without placing an order. Of these, 70% will not return. Get into the Google Display and Search Ads scene, whose capabilities offer unrivaled advantages to online stores. Show them the products they are interested in and make them come on your site with offers for those products. Facebook and InstagramYou don’t beat consumers’ ads immunity with even more commercials. You do it through better ones. Specifically, with Facebook and Instagram ads that are better targeted and more relevant. Delivering the right message to the right person at the right time brings a much better click-through rate and conversion rate. CampaignsGet more money from the customers you already have! Reduce the number of users that leave your site without buying anything and give them the feeling that they need to buy now with the help of: Pop-upsPop-ups are real-time messages automatically activated by a series of scenarios. Each is based on a proprietary algorithm already integrated into the platform. Currently, there are 3 behavioral pop-ups available on Retargeting.biz: cart abandonment, a product of interest and newsletter subscription. EmailsThese type of messages are activated by a series of predefined scenarios: abandoned carts, inactivity, bounce, etc. The content is automatically personalized and provides a further incentive for your customers to return to your website, finish a purchase or just buy more of your products. SMS98% of SMS messages are opened within 3 minutes of receiving them. Retargeting was developed with this fact in mind. The SMS functionality is integrated with all the email workflows acting as a reminder for key messages and promotions that were communicated before. Also, you can create an SMS Campaign to announce all your clients of a promotion, offer, etc. Push notificationsWith a high click-through rate, push notifications are considered as one of the most engaging communication tools that have a high conversion rate and significantly increase the sales of your online store. Recommendation EnginePersonalize your online shop for each customer! Use the information our Artificial Intelligence collects about your customers to give them the content they want automatically. Clients get the products they want to buy and you make more money.

module.name: zakeke
module.description: Let your buyers customize and view their personalized product before purchasing. Get happy customers buying from you and coming back for more
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Let your buyers customize and view their personalized product before purchasing. Get happy customers buying from you and coming back for more.
module.additional_description: Wow your visitors: customers can see their fully customized product before buying Less back and forth: get an approved, ready-for-print file for all your custom order Increase your margins: charge a percentage or a fixed rate for each customization Grow your sales: give your customers the exact product they are looking for More time on your site: real-time 3D product previews give visitors an immersive experience Zakeke Product Customizer lets customers personalize any product (clothing, promotional gifts, paper products, shoes, jewelry, watches) and visualize how they’ll look before checking out. You’ll never have to prepare proofs again or hear back from angry customers complaining “this isn’t what it’s supposed to look like”. Customers always know what they are going to get before buying, which means fewer refunds, fewer complaints, and more 5-star ratings.

Get exclusive worldwide benefits like deep discounts and easy customs forms and other international documentation.Receive customized analytics and reportsWe make your decision-making easy with detailed analysis and reporting of operations, customer engagement, sales trends, customer behavior, and product inventory recommendations.

module.name: livechatconnect
module.description: LiveChat’s PrestaShop live chat module adds a chat widget to your store with ease
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: LiveChat’s PrestaShop live chat module adds a chat widget to your store with ease. With LiveChat, you’ll be able to have conversations with on-site visitors, so you can offer them the help they need and help convert them into sales.
module.additional_description: LiveChat lets you chat with customers on the website, providing immediate assistance and increasing sales and customer satisfaction. This means you’ll be able to reach out to all of those customers that are looking for information on your website who would otherwise never try to contact you.  Thanks to LiveChat’s PrestaShop live chat module, you can trace your customers’ browsing habits and get to know them better. Also, you can see which page they are browsing and offer help in choosing the right product.  In addition to this,LiveChat provides a great customer engagement feature: chat invitations. It allows you to send time-based invitations for undecided shoppers. You can also nurture customers who reached a certain cart value to motivate them to make a purchase.
